title: Asset
description: Represents a resource of economic value, including its history of ownership and custody.

assetId.description: A unique identifier for the asset.

name.description: A common name or title for the asset (e.g., 'The Mona Lisa', 'Company Headquarters', 'Savings Account').

type.description: The specific type or category of asset (e.g., 'Real Estate', 'Vehicle', 'Art', 'Bank Account', 'Company Shares').

description.description: A detailed description of the asset.

ownerId.description: The unique identifier of the asset's current owner.

ownerType.description: The type of entity that owns the asset (e.g., 'person', 'company', 'agency').

currentValue.description: The estimated current monetary value of the asset.

currency.description: The currency unit for the asset's value (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR').

status.description: The current status of the asset (e.g., 'active', 'for_sale', 'disposed').

provenance.description: A chronological record of the asset's history of ownership and custody.

provenanceId.description: A unique ID for this specific provenance event.

description.description: A description of the event (e.g., 'Created by artist', 'Sold at auction', 'Donated to museum').

previousOwnerId.description: The ID of the owner before this event.

newOwnerId.description: The ID of the owner after this event.

source.description: A reference to a source document or record (e.g., 'Bill of Sale', 'Auction House Catalog').

accountNumber.description: The account number for a bank account or similar asset.

walletAddress.description: The address for a cryptocurrency wallet.

tickerSymbol.description: The ticker symbol for a stock or share.

numberOfShares.description: The number of shares held in a company.

physicalLocation.description: The physical location of the asset, if applicable.

tags.description: An array of keywords for categorization (e.g., 'luxury', 'liquid', 'tangible').
